title: Does One Direction ever do lip sing? - Quora

response.answer_text: Everyone has to from time to time. Artists don't like to but if there is technical difficulty, it health issues, or the acustics in the building, might require lip syncing. But you also need to understand sometimes the artists voice are on the background track to help with harmony, that backup singers normally do for them. It is away to say money and a guarantee that the backup singers. Won't crack. So many scenarios to why it is possible for artists to lip sync. If One Direction does I have no clue

No, 1D is genuine They dance, play roll in the stage and have fun, also so nice lyric changes… Also once Zayn missed his lyrics in Best song ever, so just said ‘Hoooo' in his nice falsetto… And when Zayn had left the band, harry sang Diana High Note, so it sounded , well let's say much below Zayn and Harry himself made a confused, disgusted face… So… 1D ain't lipsing, they have raw talent… Go Directioners, 1D #WeAreWaiting
